channel.title: Children's Rosary
channel.desc: Children gather to pray and learn more about the five Joyful Mysteries.

channel.title: The Promise
channel.desc: Kristy Allgeyer and her husband Steve recount all the ways they relied on the grace of God to help them through a difficult time. S1 Ep1.

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale.

channel.desc: Dedicated travellers join together and pray in a devotional ceremony at the Lourdes Grotto in France.

channel.title: Women of Grace
channel.desc: Women of Grace encourages and affirms women in their dignity as daughters of God.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Conversation

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: I Forgive with Immaculee Ilibagiza
channel.desc: Rwandan genocide survivor, Immacul?e Ilibagiza, presents stories of men and women who through their Faith, have chosen to forgive.

channel.desc: Host Catherine Hadro and a team of anti-abortion experts discuss abortion.
